text: Darko Bajić (born on 14th of May 1955) is a Serbian film director. He directed many movies and TV series popular with Serbian audience such as War Live, The Black Bomber, Sivi dom and Zaboravljeni. ==Filmography== * Sivi dom (1985), TV series * Zaboravljeni (1989), TV series * The Black Bomber (1992), film * War Live (2000), film ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from Belgrade Category:Serbian film directors
title: Darko Bajić
